name: Pacman Package Manager
section_order: Yaourt - Yaourt is a pacman frontend with added features

Pacman - Package manager utility.val: Search repository database for packages for xyz
Really synchronize repo and install xyz
Remove package xyz but keep its dependencies installed
Remove package xyz and all its dependencies (if they are not required by any other package)
Remove package xyz, all its dependencies and packages that depend on the target package
Show all files installed by the package xyz
Find the package which installed the file at /path
Remove all cached packages that are not currently installed
Install a 'local' package that is not from a remote repository (e.g. the package is from the AUR)
Download package xyz without installing it

Yaourt - Yaourt is a pacman frontend wit.val: Sync database, upgrade packages, search aur and devel (all packages based on dev version) upgrades
Check, edit, merge or remove *.pac* files
Build and export package, its sources to a directory

Removing Packages.val: Remove package 'xyz', leaving all of its dependencies installed
Remove package 'xyz' and its dependencies which are not required by any other installed package
Remove package 'xyz', its dependencies and all the packages that depend on the target package
Remove package 'xyz', which is required by another package, without removing the dependent package
Prevent the creation of the backup configuration files use the -n option
